job.about_me: Passionate and innovative Data Scientist with over 8 years+ of Software Engineering experience leveraging data to solve complex, real-time business challenges. Proficient in programming and well-versed in Data Science methodologies and Machine Learning (AI/ML). Proven track record in developing scalable AI/ML solutions, driving actionable insights, and delivering business value through data-driven decision-making.

work_experience.description:
Roles: Application Design & Architect, Lead, and Developer
Key Projects:
- Fault Alarms Prioritization: Developed AutoML models to dynamically learn true alarm severity based on user interactions, enhancing incident response efficiency.
- Anomalies & Predictions: Implemented advanced anomaly detection and KPI forecasting models to proactively mitigate potential issues.
- Resource Exhaustion Forecast: Facilitated just-in-time infrastructure rollout through predictive analytics.
- Cross & Same Layer Stitching: Enhanced topology accuracy using reliable PM data to reduce fallout.
- Fiber QoS Fingerprint Analysis: Built models to detect, localize, and mitigate Fiber’s QoS degradation issues.
- Business Impact Prioritization: Service/node issue resolution urgency analysis based on impact significance.
- Silent Fault Detection: Automated root-cause localization for QoS issues in operational blind spots.
- AI/ML Studio: Contributions to a platform for hosting and executing AI models and pipelines, that enables Bring-Your-Own-ML model management with versioning and rollback features.
- GenAI Powered Help: Solutions for documentation summarization and natural language interaction.
- Agentic AI Capabilities: Working on the development of autonomous AI agents using LangFlow, LangGraph, and MCP & A2A servers, LangFuse, enabling dynamic workflow orchestration, real-time monitoring, and scalable AI-driven decision-making for network optimization.
 
POCs and Research Projects:
- GenAI Powered Automated Dashboard Generation: Developing a dynamic dashboard with data visualization & problem summarization.
- GenAI Powered RA (Resource Adapter) Generation: Solving the problem of developers having to manually generate RAs, which takes time and effort.

Roles: Application Design & Architect, Lead, and Developer
Key Projects:
- Enterprise Project Delivery Intelligence: Designed and led the development of a predictive analytics tool for deployment cycle management, providing immersive dashboards with actionable insights into past, ongoing, and future events.
- Auto Self-Heal System: Developed a machine learning-based case classification and queue assignment tool, improving resolution times and operational efficiency.
- Predictive Analysis: Leveraged text summarization and image-to-text conversion models to streamline decision-making processes for delivery and voice-powered AI engines.

soft: Proven track record of working independently and collaboratively in team settings
Ability to innovate and drive actionable insights from complex data

Multiple patent plaques awarded for publishing a novel AI/ML-based US patents.
